comments.html: Enjoy the break, Ivan, and post some pictures here if you don't mind :-) I would love to discover Europe myself and will probably plan a trip sometimes in 2009.
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html:
You could find pictures from my recent hikes in my Picasa album. Some more hikes around Slovenia are documented on my personal web site.

If you ever come to my part of Europe, let me know :)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak
